source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.title: Complete Guide To Mastering Assertiveness
items.headline: Regain Your Power To Create Greater Influence And Impact
objectives_summary: The difference between people and really successful people is that they know how to be assertive. It is one skill that has the power to magnify so many other leadership strengths.  From a psychological point of view, we are constantly communicating with each other to meet our needs. Two unhealthy ways of meeting our needs is when we try to suppress (which is passivity) or satisfy them in an aggressive way. Both ways backfire sooner or later, and leading to frustration and inauthenticity.  Being assertive is when we learn to state our needs clearly and meet them respectfully. Are you ready to create this in your life? Are you ready to communicate in way that influences people?  This step by step guide, offers you the most insightful & practical approach, to Master Assertiveness.
Understand What Is Assertiveness and how is it different from being aggressive or passive
Discover how lack of assertiveness affects self esteem and confidence
